statements.statement: SELECT ROWIDTOCHAR( ROWID ) DATA_ROW_ID ,DFRD_BIZ_ID ,INST_NO ,NODE_NO ,DFRD_SEQ ,GUID ,PATH_NO ,TRAN_ID ,TRAN_DT ,TRAN_HEADER ,IN_DATA1 ,IN_DATA2 ,IN_DATA3 ,IN_DATA4 ,IN_DATA5 ,IN_DATA6 ,IN_DATA7 ,IN_DATA8 ,IN_DATA9 ,IN_DATA10 FROM DEVON.SERL_APPLOG_ER01 WHERE DFRD_SEQ BETWEEN ${STRT_DFRD_SEQ} AND ${END_DFRD_SEQ} AND DFRD_BIZ_ID = ${DFRD_BIZ_ID} AND TRAN_DT = ${TRAN_DT} AND NODE_NO = ${NODE_NO} AND INST_NO = ${INST_NO} -- ORDER BY DFRD_SEQ
